Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's an investment that could significantly enhance your business operations and profitability. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth more than just the cost of production. Considering its worth to both us and you, I propose a price of $10,000 for the product. This offer includes all the benefits and support you'll need to make the most out of this investment. Let me know if you have any questions or need further details. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
